summary: So, I have a self-censoring extension on Google Chrome, and I made it replace “M*noru M*neta” with the word “Loser”. Tried it...
caption:
So, I have a self-censoring extension on Google Chrome, and I made it replace “M*noru M*neta” with the word “Loser”. Tried it out on the BNHA Fandom page, and it worked! 

Unfortunately, I couldn’t quite censor M*n*ta’s photo, so I had to use my secret quirk: Photo Editing. 

P.S.: The extension is called “Advanced Profanity Filter”. You can control the words that are filtered thru this extension.

an incredible use of modern technology, thank you for the recommendation

blog.title: Shitty Hair x Blasty Fanfics
blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: Clouded
description:
by ErrorTryAgain

“As you all know a few weeks back, my letters made it into the internet. I was so excited that my love is being known throughout the world, but it seems like Kacchan doesn’t plan to acknowledge it. I’m so hurt, have you forgotten about our past? Weren’t we close?” Izuku leaned back from the camera.

One shouldn’t just believe what the media says.

Words: 2685, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
